title: Full Metal Jayce Voice Bug
body: Yesterday I played a game with the skin Full Metal Jayce and realized that his voice was'nt robotic. Can Riot fix this? The robotic voice makes up for the skin imo.

replies.body: Same as officer vi when her passive is up she gets the neon force ball instead……………… Like yeah it looks cool and weird at the same time but its not part of the skin. But i have demon so its all g
